kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Gotcha, makes sense.
If you run into other issues like this with our integrations you can use the example Dancing Goat project [included with each integration](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-lucene/tree/v12.3.0/examples/DancingGoat) to test out the code/appsettings configuration.
Additionally, each integration has [a full Usage-Guide.md](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-lucene/blob/v12.3.0/docs/Usage-Guide.md) that covers configuration and customization options.
